submission.individual-reflection: During this exercize I became familliar with property graphs and compared data structured in graphs and in XML. After working in the group I didn't find anything really new. Overall my solution was fine, except of the graph structure as it could be better. I hope my feedback helps my teammates, but their solution was alright too. I didn't improve my solution because it was overall alright. I don't have any suggestions, everything was fine.
